name: notion-capture
description: Save all of your Notion data in GitHub

GITHUB_USERNAME.description: Your GitHub username. This will be used to access a notion-backup repo in your account.

GITHUB_PASSWORD.description: A personal access token you've created in your GitHub settings. This will be used to access a notion-backup repo in your account.

GITHUB_REPO_NAME.description: The name of your repo that will ultimately hold the Notion data.

NOTION_EMAIL.description: Your Notion email address. This will be used to retrieve an auth token from Notion's API.

NOTION_PASSWORD.description: Your Notion password. This will be used to retrieve an auth token from Notion's API.

NOTION_USER_ID.description: Your Notion user id. This will be used to access your data using Notion's API.

SIDEKIQ_USERNAME.description: A username to access the Sidekiq Web UI.

SIDEKIQ_PASSWORD.description: A password to access the Sidekiq Web UI.
